languages.text: Immune to mental and warp damage and to the most effects. Protected by {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}adamantine plating{/g} which grants it significant {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. However, this plating is vulnerable to {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shells{/g}.
languages.original_text: Объект невосприимчив к психическому и варп-урону, а также к большинству эффектов. Защищен {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}адамантиумным покрытием{/g}, которое обеспечивает значительное {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}, однако уязвимо к {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}бронебойно-фугасным снарядам{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This object is immune to the most effects and protected by {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}adamantine plating{/g}. Adamantine grants it significant deflection and armour but this plating is vulnerable to {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shells{/g}.

Immune to mental and warp damage and to the most effects. Protected by {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}adamantine plating{/g} which grants it significant {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. However, this plating is vulnerable to {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shells{/g}.

Immune to mental and warp damage and to the most effects. Protected by {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}adamantine plating{/g} which grants it significant {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. However, this plating is vulnerable to {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shells{/g}.

languages.text:
Immune to most effects and protected by {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}adamantine plating{/g}. Adamantine plating grants it significant {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}; however, this plating is vulnerable to {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shells{/g}.
It is also completely immune to mental and warp damage.

traits.locale_text:
Immune to most effects and protected by {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}adamantine plating{/g}. Adamantine plating grants it significant {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}; however, this plating is vulnerable to {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shells{/g}.
It is also completely immune to mental and warp damage.

languages.text: Объект невосприимчив к психическому и варп-урону, а также к большинству эффектов. Защищен {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}адамантиумным покрытием{/g}, которое обеспечивает значительное {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}, однако уязвимо к {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}бронебойно-фугасным снарядам{/g}.
languages.original_text: Immune to mental and warp damage and to the most effects. Protected by {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}adamantine plating{/g} which grants it significant {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. However, this plating is vulnerable to {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shells{/g}.

languages.text: Zihinsel hasara, öteboyut hasarına ve çoğu etkiye karşı bağışıktır. Önemli ölçüde {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değeri kazandıran {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}adamantin kaplama{/g} ile korur. Ancak bu kaplama, {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}ZDYP top mermilerine{/g} karşı dayanıksızdır.
languages.original_text: Immune to mental and warp damage and to the most effects. Protected by {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}adamantine plating{/g} which grants it significant {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. However, this plating is vulnerable to {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shells{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Zihinsel hasara, öteboyut hasarına ve çoğu etkiye karşı bağışıktır. Önemli ölçüde {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değeri kazandıran {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}adamantin kaplama{/g} ile korur. Ancak bu kaplama, {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}ZDYP top mermilerine{/g} karşı dayanıksızdır.

languages.text: Inmune al daño mental, al daño de disformidad y a la mayoría de los efectos. Protegido por un {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}blindaje adamantino{/g} que le confiere sus considerables puntuaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}. Sin embargo, este blindaje es vulnerable a los {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}obuses perforantes explosivos{/g}.
languages.original_text: Immune to mental and warp damage and to the most effects. Protected by {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}adamantine plating{/g} which grants it significant {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. However, this plating is vulnerable to {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shells{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Inmune al daño mental, al daño de disformidad y a la mayoría de los efectos. Protegido por un {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}blindaje adamantino{/g} que le confiere sus considerables puntuaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}. Sin embargo, este blindaje es vulnerable a los {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}obuses perforantes explosivos{/g}.

languages.text: 对精神伤害、亚空间伤害与绝大多数效果免疫。此外，此单位受到{g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}精金外壳{/g}保护，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}明显提高，但精金外壳可以被{g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}高爆穿甲弹{/g}破坏。
languages.original_text: Immune to mental and warp damage and to the most effects. Protected by {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}adamantine plating{/g} which grants it significant {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. However, this plating is vulnerable to {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shells{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 对精神伤害、亚空间伤害与绝大多数效果免疫。此外，此单位受到{g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}精金外壳{/g}保护，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}明显提高，但精金外壳可以被{g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}高爆穿甲弹{/g}破坏。

languages.text: Invulnérable aux dégâts du Warp et à la plupart des effets. Protégé par un {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}revêtement d'adamantine{/g} qui lui confère une {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} et une {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} élevées. Cependant, ce revêtement est vulnérable aux {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}obus APHE{/g}.
languages.original_text: Immune to mental and warp damage and to the most effects. Protected by {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}adamantine plating{/g} which grants it significant {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. However, this plating is vulnerable to {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shells{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Invulnérable aux dégâts du Warp et à la plupart des effets. Protégé par un {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}revêtement d'adamantine{/g} qui lui confère une {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} et une {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} élevées. Cependant, ce revêtement est vulnérable aux {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}obus APHE{/g}.

languages.text: 精神的ダメージとワープダメージ、さらにほとんどの効果に対して耐性がある。{g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}アダマンチウムプレーティング{/g}によりかなりの{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が付与される。しかし、このプレーティングは{g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHEシェル{/g}に弱い。
languages.original_text: Immune to mental and warp damage and to the most effects. Protected by {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}adamantine plating{/g} which grants it significant {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. However, this plating is vulnerable to {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shells{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 精神的ダメージとワープダメージ、さらにほとんどの効果に対して耐性がある。{g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}アダマンチウムプレーティング{/g}によりかなりの{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が付与される。しかし、このプレーティングは{g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHEシェル{/g}に弱い。

languages.text: Immun gegen Mental- und Warp-Schaden sowie die meisten Effekte. Durch eine {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}Adamantpanzerung{/g} geschützt, die {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} deutlich erhöht. Allerdings ist diese Panzerung verwundbar durch {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE-Granaten{/g}.

Protected by {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}adamantine plating{/g} which grants it significant {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. However, this plating is vulnerable to {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shells{/g}.

Durch eine {g|f:93ff50d5f750403889f67d68893a7ad4}Adamantpanzerung{/g} geschützt, die {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} deutlich erhöht. Allerdings ist diese Panzerung verwundbar durch {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE-Granaten{/g}.
